text: Broken! #Anacostia #F06S01. Status is Power Outage. Last broke 2 days ago. http://www.dcmetrometrics.com/unit/F06S01ESCALATOR …
Update : @HydroOne now says ETR is 3:30pm for Power Outage just outside of Huntsville on Hwy 60 Use Caution in area for Hydro Crews
Newsroom. Bruce County Museum and Cultural Centre is closed for the day because of a power outage. @brucemuseum
Due to a power outage in the area, Poughkeepsie Hearings have been postponed for the remainder of the day
